name: Ext_R2_Appointment_priority
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Appointment.priority for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Appointment.priority from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize
element.definition: The priority of the appointment. Can be used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize appointments. (The iCal Standard specifies 0 as undefined, 1 as highest, 9 as lowest priority).
element.comment: `Appointment.priority` maps to R5 `Appointment.priority`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
